QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Victim assistance - resources
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations are good resources for information on domestic violence and rape : Administration for Children & Families -- www.acf.hhs.gov , Federal Bureau of Investigation -- www.fbi.gov/how-we-can-help-you/victim-services , National Center for Victims of Crime -- victimsofcrime.org , National Domestic Violence Hotline -- www.thehotline.org , Office for Victims of Crime -- www.ovc.ojp.gov , RAINN (Rape, Abuse & Incest National Network) -- www.rainn.org ,
